CreateCosTokenV2.document: This example shows you how to generate a COS temporary key for an uploaded JAR or WAR package.
CreateCosTokenV2.title: Generating COS temporary key

CreateNamespace.document: This example shows you how to create an environment (namespace).
CreateNamespace.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tem.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateNamespace
<Common request parameters>

{
    "NamespaceName": "xx",
    "K8sVersion": "1.16.9",
    "SubnetIds": [
        "xx"
    ],
    "Description": "xx",
    "Vpc": "xx"
}
CreateNamespace.title: Creating environment (namespace)

CreateResource.document: This example shows you how to create an environment (namespace).
CreateResource.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tem.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateResource
<Common request parameters>

{
    "NamespaceId": "env-xx",
    "ResourceType": "VPC",
    "ResourceId": "vpc-xxx"
}
CreateResource.title: Creating environment (namespace)

CreateServiceV2.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tem.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateServiceV2
<Common request parameters>

{
    "SubnetList": [
        "xx"
    ],
    "Description": "xx",
    "InstanceId": "xx",
    "DeployMode": "xx",
    "RepoServer": "xx",
    "SourceChannel": 0,
    "ServiceName": "xx",
    "RepoType": 0,
    "RepoName": "xx",
    "UseDefaultImageService": 0,
    "CodingLanguage": "xx"
}
CreateServiceV2.title: Creating service

DeleteIngress.document: This example shows you how to query an ingress rule.
DeleteIngress.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tem.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DeleteIngress
<Common request parameters>

{
    "NamespaceId": "cls-xxx",
    "EksNamespace": "default",
    "Name": "xxxx"
}
DeleteIngress.title: Querying ingress rule

DeployServiceV2.document: This example shows you how to deploy a service version.
DeployServiceV2.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tem.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DeployServiceV2
<Common request parameters>

{
    "JvmOpts": "xx",
    "StorageConfs": [
        {
            "StorageVolName": "xx",
            "StorageVolPath": "xx"
        }
    ],
    "ImgRepo": "xx",
    "EnvConf": [
        {
            "Value": "xx",
            "Key": "xx"
        }
    ],
    "Description": "xx",
    "JdkVersion": "xx",
    "ContainerPort": 1,
    "LogOutputConf": {
        "ClsLogTopicId": "xx",
        "ClsLogsetName": "xx",
        "OutputType": "xx"
    },
    "CpuSpec": 0.0,
    "DeployMode": "xx",
    "SecurityGroupIds": [
        "xx"
    ],
    "SourceChannel": 0,
    "DeployVersion": "xx",
    "InitPodNum": 1,
    "VersionDesc": "xx",
    "MemorySpec": 0.0,
    "LogConfs": [
        "xx"
    ],
    "PkgName": "xx",
    "StorageMountConfs": [
        {
            "VolumeName": "xx",
            "MountPath": "xx"
        }
    ],
    "EsInfo": {
        "MinAliveInstances": 0,
        "EsStrategy": 0,
        "VersionId": "xx",
        "Threshold": 1,
        "MaxAliveInstances": 2
    },
    "ServiceId": "xx",
    "NamespaceId": "xx"
}
DeployServiceV2.title: Deploying service version

DescribeIngress.document: This example shows you how to query an ingress rule.
DescribeIngress.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tem.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeIngress
<Common request parameters>

{
    "NamespaceId": "env-xxx",
    "EksNamespace": "default",
    "Name": "xxx"
}
DescribeIngress.title: Querying ingress rule

DescribeIngresses.document: This example shows you how to get the list of ingress rules.
DescribeIngresses.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tem.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeIngresses
<Common request parameters>

{
    "NamespaceId": "env-xxx",
    "EksNamespace": "default",
    "Names": [
        "test-ingress-1"
    ]
}
DescribeIngresses.title: Getting the list of ingress rules
